verses.roman:
prema-paripāṭī ei adbhuta varṇana
śuni' citta-karṇera haya ānanda-ghūrṇana

synonyms: prema-paripāṭī—a first-class arrangement to express loving affairs; ei—this; adbhuta varṇana—wonderful description; śuni'-hearing; citta-karṇera—of the heart and the ear; haya—there is; ānanda-ghūrṇana—a whirlpool of transcendental bliss.
translation: The wonderful descriptions of Rūpa Gosvāmī are superb arrangements to express loving affairs. Hearing them will plunge the heart and ears of everyone into a whirlpool of transcendental bliss.
